plot: Two kids go hunting for ghosts to help their dad run a burger cafe. An epic sequel to "T is For Toilet [ABCs of Death]", 12 years after the accident.
title: Ghost Burger
plot_es: Two kids go hunting for ghosts to help their dad run a burger cafe. An epic sequel to "T is For Toilet [ABCs of Death]", 12 years after the accident.
plot_en: Two kids go hunting for ghosts to help their dad run a burger cafe. An epic sequel to "T is For Toilet [ABCs of Death]", 12 years after the accident.
